project.name: Temporarily Distributed Mock
project.description:
This plugin can be used to emulate the existence of a Data Grid in workloads that do not share keys between different nodes. Each node uses a ConcurrentHashMap to store the information, and the plugin uses RadarGun-specific knowlege to provide answer to requests that assume a connection between the nodes, such as the ClusterValidationStage.
It initially uses a real data grid to shared information, enabling its users to perform an initial setup that may required shared state. After a fixed number of transactions is stops using the real data grid and uses the mock only.
